escalate: Before you ESC use ESC shortcut
When ESC code issues, add the code to the escalation notes
Always add the customer's name in your esc notes
tone: Don't respond if the customer doesn't want to engage
templates: For inquiries regarding their order updates/status/tracking, use UPD shortcut

Faherty Brand: Thanks for reaching out, and I'm sorry to hear that. Have you encountered any error messages? Also, could you kindly share a screenshot of the items in your cart? I'll be happy to look into the issue!

escalate: Esc inquiries about items not on the site
ESC if the cx missed a sale & wants to take advantage of it
ESC if the customer is asking for a discount and we don't have one
If cx is looking for general recommendations use LFR shortcut and ESC
templates: If cx is building a new home, interested in refurnishing their entire home or rooms in their home, use the IDS shortcut
If cx is shopping for a client use SFC shortcut
Any convo without a positive outcome (out of stock, not on sale, not shipping in time), use DSS shortcut
dos_and_donts: For product-specific delivery time-frame inquiries always check the product page for delivery info and share that with the cx

Bonafide: Hi, this is Heather from Bonafide! Any questions about our products? bonafide.attn.tv/adrWOHHFfj-X .
What is different between thermella and relizen?
Template used: "What is the difference between Thermella and Relizen?  "; last updated: 2024-09-11 21:13:19.145

Bonafide: Thank you for reaching out! I apologize for the late response. 

Thermella and Relizen were both shown in separate clinical studies to relieve hot flashes and night sweats. However, Thermella relieves hot flashes as early as just two weeks. It relieves hot flashes at the source by blocking NKB, a peptide in the body's thermoregulatory center that triggers hot flashes and night sweats. 

On the other hand, Relizen works as early as two months by inhibiting the reuptake of serotonin in the body. Both treatments are effective, but Thermella has been shown to provide more hot flash and night sweat relief, faster. 

Please note that these results for Thermella and Relizen are based on separate clinical studies for each product.
